actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize the use of rights-of-way along Federal-aid highways for the construction of transportation systems that will be part of the Federal-aid highway system.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations allowing the States to use rights-of-way along Federal-aid highways for the construction of magnetic levitation systems as part of the Federal-aid highway system.

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize the use of rights-of-way along Federal-aid highways for the construction of transportation systems that will be part of the Federal-aid highway system.
